title: Christian observations and resolutions, or, The daylie practise of the renewed  man, turning all occurrents to spirituall uses, and these uses to his vnion with God I. centurie : vvith a resolution for death, &c. / newlie published by Mr William Struther ...
author: Struther, William, 1578-1633.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by the heires of Andro Hart,
